content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Stone mine at position(-46.0, 0.0)
Consists of 
- Burner mining drill (position -46.0, 0.0) 
- Wooden chest (position -45.5, 1.5)

### Stone brick factory at position(0.0, 0.0)
Consists of 
- Stone furnace (position 0.0, 0.0)
- Burner inserter (position 1.5, 0.5) that extracts stone bricks from the furnace
- Wooden chest (position 2.5, 0.5) to catch stone bricks

### Iron plate factory at position(0.0, 5.0)
Consists of 
- Stone furnace (position 0.0, 5.0)
- Burner mining drill (position 16.0, 71.0) to mine iron ore
- Wooden chest (position 16.5, 72.5) to catch iron ore

### Copper ore mine at position(-46.0, 71.0)
Consists of 
- Burner mining drill (position -46.0, 71.0) 
- Wooden chest (position -45.5, 72.5) to catch copper ore
- Stone furnace (position -47.0, 73.0) to smelt copper ore into copper plates

### Iron gear wheel factory at position(5.5, 5.5)
Consists of 
- Assembling machine (position 5.5, 5.5)

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when placing entities too far away
- Ensure that you move to the target position before attempting to place entities.

### Errors when crafting items with missing sub-ingredients
- Ensure that you have the required sub-ingredients in your inventory or have a setup to craft them.

### Errors when inserting items into entities
- Ensure that you have the required items in your inventory before attempting to insert them into entities.

### Errors when extracting items from entities
- Ensure that the entity contains the required items before attempting to extract them.

### Errors when placing entities without required items in inventory
- Ensure that you have the required items in your inventory before attempting to place entities.

### Errors due to undefined variables
- Ensure that all variables are defined before using them in your code.

### Errors when extracting items from entities that are not ready
- Ensure that the entity has finished its production cycle before attempting to extract items.

### Errors when getting entities that do not exist
- Ensure that the entity exists at the specified position before attempting to get it.

### Errors when finding nearest entities that do not exist
- Ensure that the entity type exists on the surface before attempting to find the nearest one.

## NAMESPACE
No utility functions defined by the agent were found in the provided logs.
